posts.text:
sælir hérna er info,prísinn 35.000


BFGoodrich Comp TA Drag Radial: The tyre that dominates "DOT Street Radial" competition: NHRA, NDRA and NMCA world recordholders! Compounded exclusively for racers seeking maximum acceleration and control on the strip and off. Record-setting drag performance with streetable handling.


60 series P235/60R15, 

High-Speed Control: The special radial-carcass construction allows for high-speed stability and control, plus more cornering performance while being compatible with radial front tyres for improved overall handling and balance. 

Max Grip: The ETEC (Equal Tension Containment) system in the BFGoodrich Comp T/A Drag Radial resists centrifugal force to ensure the consistency of the footprint. This maintains the tread contact area for maximum grip off the 

line.
það má alveg skoða smá afslátt
